translation.en: LOSING DIANA WAS LIKE LOSING A PART OF ME.
translation.zh: 失去黛安娜就像失去了自己

translation.en: NOTHING COULD CHANGE I THOUGHT THE WAY WE FELT ABOUT EACH OTHER.
translation.zh: 我以为任何事情都改变不了 我俩对彼此的想法

translation.en: WE WERE INVINCIBLE. I THOUGHT
translation.zh: 以为我俩的关系牢不可破

translation.en: SOMEONE ONCE SAID, IF YOU WANT SOMETHING VERY BADLY,
translation.zh: 有人说如果你很想要一件东西

translation.en: SET IT FREE.
IF IT COMES BACK TO YOU,
IT'S YOURS FOREVER.
IF IT DOESN'T,
IT WAS NEVER YOURS TO BEGIN WITH.
I KNEW ONE THING.
I WAS DAVID'S TO BEGIN WITH, AND HE WAS MINE.
translation.zh: 我和大卫是对方的初恋情人

translation.en: ♪ YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE... ♪
WE MET IN HIGH SCHOOL. [DIANA]
DAVID WAS A SENIOR AND I WAS A FRESHMAN.
translation.zh: 大卫念高三 我念高一

translation.en: ON WEDNESDAYS AFTER GLEE CLUB,
HE'D DRIVE ME AND MY BEST FRIEND HOME FROM SCHOOL.
translation.zh: 他都会开车送我和好友回家

translation.en: I USED TO WATCH HIM
I FELL IN LOVE WITH HIS EYES.
DAVID PROPOSED TO ME WHEN I WAS 19,
translation.zh: 我十九岁那年 大卫在天堂湾的渡口向我求婚

translation.en: AT PARADISE COVE. ON THE PIER
translation.zh: 大卫在天堂湾的渡口向我求婚

translation.en: OUR PARENTS WERE AGAINST IT.
WE WERE TOO YOUNG. THEY SAID
translation.zh: 说我们太年轻 彼此了解不深

translation.en: THAT A LIFE WITHOUT RISK BUT DAVID SAID
translation.zh: 但是大卫说 人生没有风险就不是人生

translation.en: SO WE ELOPED.
[DAVID] I GRADUATED FROM ARCHITECTURE SCHOOL AND GOT A JOB AT A SMALL FIRM.
translation.zh: 我读建筑学校毕业后 在一家小公司上班

translation.en: DIANA HELPED SUPPORT US BY SELLING REAL ESTATE.
translation.zh: 黛安娜销售房地产 帮忙养家

translation.en: I SPENT ALL OF MY FREE TIME WORKING ON A DESIGN OF MY OWN.
translation.zh: 我空闲时会设计自己的房子

translation.en: IT SUMMED UP EVERYTHING ABOUT ARCHITECTURE THAT REALLY MATTERED TO ME.
translation.zh: 它包含了我所有建筑理念

translation.en: IT WAS MY DREAM HOUSE.
DAVID...
HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU I LOVE YOU?
NO.
I DO. STILL?
ALWAYS.
WE HAD OUR DIFFERENCES. [DIANA]
HE USED TO TAKE HIS CLOTHES OFF
translation.zh: 他习惯脱了衣服随地乱丢

translation.en: AND LEAVE THEM ON THE FLOOR.
WHAT DO YOU THINK THIS IS?!
YOU LEAVE YOUR SHOES ON THE TABLE?
translation.zh: 把鞋子放在桌上 我不必洗你的臭衣服

translation.en: I DON'T NEED TO DO YOUR FUCKING LAUNDRY!
HONEY, I'LL PICK IT UP. YOU DON'T HAVE TO GET VIOLENT.
translation.zh: 我来捡 你用不着对我动武

translation.en: WHAT ABOUT THIS?
PUT THAT DOWN. THAT IS SERIOUS.
translation.zh: -刀子用过也不擦？ -把刀放下！ 我认真的 你会弄伤别人

translation.en: YOU'RE GOING TO HURT SOMEBODY. I'M GOING TO HURT SOMEBODY? HUH?
NOW, HO, HO! O.K., NOW, FINE.
OW! GODDAMN IT!
NOW, COME ON. LET'S JUST RELAX.
DID I HURT YOU?
NO. COME ON. I'M SORRY.
REALLY? YEAH. YOU WERE KIDDING?
YOUR PANTS ARE ON FIRE.
YOU HAVE NO IDEA.
WE NEVER HAD MUCH MONEY, [DIANA]
translation.zh: 我们没钱 空闲的时候

translation.en: SO FOR ENTERTAINMENT, DAVID WOULD SHOW ME ARCHITECTURE THAT MOVED HIM.
translation.zh: 大卫会带我去看他喜欢的建筑物

translation.en: BUT SOMETIMES I'D HAVE TO ASK,
translation.zh: 我有时候会问 干嘛这么无聊 看别人洗车？

translation.en: WHY ARE WE LOOKING AT A STUPID CAR WASH?
translation.zh: 干嘛这么无聊 看别人洗车？

translation.en: AND HE'D JUST SAY, "NO, NOT STUPID.
DON'T JUST USE YOUR EYES."
AT THINGS DIFFERENTLY. HE MADE ME LOOK
translation.zh: 他教会我用不同的角度看事物

translation.en: DAVID, THIS IS A STEAL. IT JUST CAME INTO THE OFFICE.
translation.zh: 这是偷拿的 资料才刚到 别人还不知道

translation.en: NOBODY KNOWS ABOUT IT YET. IT'S BEAUTIFUL.
YOU COULD BUILD A HOUSE HERE,
MAKE A NAME FOR YOURSELF.
translation.zh: 你会因此成名 因为房子会很美

translation.en: OF COURSE THE HOUSE WOULD BE BRILLIANT
translation.zh: 因为房子会很美 它将是大卫墨菲的家

translation.en: BECAUSE IT WOULD BE A DAVID MURPHY HOUSE.
I FOUND AN INCREDIBLE PIECE OF PROPERTY IN SANTA MONICA BY THE OCEAN.
translation.zh: 我在圣塔莫妮卡海边找到一块好地

translation.en: IT WAS THE PERFECT SITE FOR DAVID'S HOUSE.
translation.zh: 这里最适合盖大卫的房子 -我们怎么做得到？ -我们跟别人一样贷款

translation.en: WE'LL BORROW THE MONEY LIKE EVERYBODY ELSE.
translation.zh: -我们怎么做得到？ -我们跟别人一样贷款 这些炒作股票的人

translation.en: THESE LEVERAGE- STOCKBROKER-BUYOUT GUYS,
YOU SHOULD SEE THE JUNK THEY BUY.
THEY'D GO CRAZY FOR A HOUSE OF YOURS.
translation.zh: 买的房地产太差劲了 你的房子会让他们爱死了

translation.en: IT WAS BRILLIANT... [DAVID]
EVEN THOUGH I DIDN'T UNDERSTAND A WORD OF IT.
WE HAD TO TIGHTEN OUR BELTS FOR THE LOAN PAYMENTS,
translation.zh: 我们为了偿还贷款要省吃俭用 但这房子是我们的将来

translation.en: BUT IT WAS OUR FUTURE,
translation.zh: 我们为了偿还贷款要省吃俭用 但这房子是我们的将来 我得盖自己的房子

translation.en: AND I GOT TO BUILD MY HOUSE.
THE RECESSION HIT. AND THEN
translation.zh: 可是我们却遇上不景气

translation.en: [DIANA] THE REAL ESTATE MARKET DRIED UP
AND I HADN'T CLOSED A SALE IN SIX MONTHS.
translation.zh: 我有六个月没完成过买卖 （自由参观）

translation.en: [DAVID] CONSTRUCTION FELL TO ITS LOWEST POINT IN YEARS.
translation.zh: 建筑业跌到几年来的最低点

translation.en: PEOPLE WERE BEING LAID OFF EVERYWHERE,
translation.zh: 到处都在裁员 我也在被裁之列

translation.en: AND I WAS ONE OF THEM.
translation.zh: 到处都在裁员 我也在被裁之列 对此我也很难过

translation.en: I FEEL BAD ABOUT THIS.
I DON'T UNDERSTAND. WHAT HAPPENED?
translation.zh: 我不明白 怎么回事？

translation.en: THE BANK HAS CALLED IN THE DEMAND NOTE.
translation.zh: 银行要你们拿出即期票据

translation.en: CAN THEY DO THAT?
ANY INCOME RIGHT NOW, YOU DON'T HAVE
translation.zh: 你们目前没有收入 所以…

translation.en: ATTACH YOUR ASSETS. SO THEY COULD
translation.zh: 他们可以扣押你们的资产

translation.en: WHAT ASSETS?
YOUR HOUSE.
YOU'VE GOT TO KEEP UP THOSE PAYMENTS.
I'M SORRY.
DAVID, I'M SCARED.
WE DON'T HAVE ANY MONEY.
WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO?
I'LL WAIT TABLES OR DRIVE A CAB OR SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 我去当服务生或开计程车

translation.en: I'LL TAKE CARE OF YOU.
MAKE IT GO AWAY.
I WAS DESPERATE. [DAVID] TO LOSE EVERYTHING-- WE STOOD
translation.zh: 我绝望了 我们束手无策

translation.en: THE HOUSE I'D BEEN BUILDING, EVEN OUR OWN HOME.
translation.zh: 我在盖的房子 甚至住家 都快要失去

translation.en: I SWALLOWED MY PRIDE AND BORROWED $5,000 FROM MY FATHER.
translation.zh: 我厚着脸皮向父亲借了五千元

translation.en: IT WASN'T ENOUGH.
WE NEEDED $50,000.
D? D? D?
WHAT? GET UP. GET DRESSED.
translation.zh: 起来穿衣服 我有个主意

translation.en: I GOT AN IDEA. COME ON. WHAT TIME IS IT?
HI. HOW YOU DOING? CIGARS, CIGARETTES, LIGHTED YO-YOS?
OH, YEAH! OH, MY GOD!
OH, HONEY, THAT'S THE SPIRIT.
KEEP 'EM COMING-- 50,000 OF THEM!
translation.zh: 继续来吧 五万是我们的目标

translation.en: THAT'S ALL WE WANT! WE'RE WINNERS!
translation.zh: 继续来吧 五万是我们的目标 我们赢了 （一百万）

translation.en: GET IT! GET IT!
PUT THE MONEY IN THE KITTY.
translation.zh: 中…让我们多赢一点 十一点 赢了！

translation.en: 11 IS A WINNER.
WE GOT A SHOOTER NOW, FOLKS. WE GOT A SHOOTER.
9. GET DOWN, WASHINGTON AIN'T FINE.
ALL IN THE WAND.
WHY DON'T YOU PUT IT ON? IT SUITS YOU.
translation.zh: 你何不穿上？你穿很合适

translation.en: WELL, I CAN'T AFFORD IT.
THAT'S TOO BAD.
I REALLY THINK YOU OUGHT TO HAVE THE DRESS.
translation.zh: 我认为你该拥有这条裙子

translation.en: LET ME BUY IT FOR YOU.
YOU WANT TO BUY ME THIS DRESS?
translation.zh: 你要买这裙子给我？ 是的

translation.en: WHY? I'VE ENJOYED WATCHING YOU.
YOU'VE EARNED IT.
NO, I HAVEN'T.
THE DRESS IS FOR SALE. I'M NOT.
translation.zh: 衣服可卖 可是我的人不卖

translation.en: BOOM!
WE GOT A NEW SHOOTER NOW COMING OUT.
ROLL 'EM NOW, GIRLFRIEND!
TAKE A LOOK. I'M UP OVER $9,000. OH, MY GOD!
translation.zh: -你看 我赢到九千元了 -我的天

translation.en: THAT'S GREAT!
HEY, THIS IS MY WIFE D.
THESE ARE MY GIRLS. THEY'LL BE MOVING IN.
KISS 'EM.
HERE COME THE WINNINGS! GET IT! GET IT!
DID I EVER TELL YOU I LOVE YOU?
NO. I DO.
STILL?
THIS LITTLE PILE HERE, YOU GUESSED IT. 5 MORE, D.
WHAT DO YOU THINK THIS IS? 5 MORE.
translation.zh: 你以为这是什么？还有五千！

translation.en: PLAY WITH IT, ROLL AROUND WITH IT, ENJOY YOURSELF.
translation.zh: 拿去玩 在钱上滚 尽情享受

translation.en: OH, MY!
AND THE GRAND TOTAL IS...
SO WE'RE HALFWAY THERE, LIKE IN A HOUR.
translation.zh: 一小时左右 我们就赢得半数

translation.en: I FIGURE ABOUT... TWO HOURS TOMORROW,
WE'LL BE HOME FREE.
WHAT?
I LOVE YOU.
I KNOW THAT.
NO, I MEAN, EVEN WITHOUT THE MONEY.
translation.zh: 就算没这些钱 我也爱你

translation.en: LAST CALL FOR WAGERS. NO MORE BETS.
translation.zh: 最后叫注 不许再下注

translation.en: NO MORE BETS, PLEASE.
WE HAVE 4,100.
translation.zh: 四千一百 我们讲好以五千为底限

translation.en: WE SAID WE WOULDN'T GO BELOW 5,000.
translation.zh: 四千一百 我们讲好以五千为底限 要添咖啡吗？

translation.en: DO YOU WANT ANY MORE COFFEE?
NO, THANK YOU.
TAILS WE QUIT, HEADS WE GO FOR IT.
translation.zh: 反面就打住 正面就搏下去

translation.en: 2 OUT OF 3. 2 OUT OF 3.
LAST CALL FOR WAGERS. NO MORE BETS.
translation.zh: 最后叫注 不许再下注

translation.en: O.K., I'M FEELING LUCKY.
I SAY WE PUT IT ON RED.
translation.zh: 我觉得红色好运 我们把所有钱押红色

translation.en: ALL OF IT. RED.
I FEEL RED. DO YOU FEEL RED, D?
translation.zh: 我觉得是红 你觉得是红吗？

translation.en: WE CAN DO THIS, HUH? D?
I'M GOING TO PUT IT ALL.
I'M PUTTING IT ON RED.
O.K.
NO, IT'S BLACK. IT'S BLACK. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
NO, NO, IT'S RED. IT'S RED.
GO WITH YOUR INSTINCT, RIGHT? NO MORE BETS.
translation.zh: -凭直觉下注 对吧？ -不许再下注

translation.en: COME ON, MAN. COME ON, RED.
GOTTA GET IT. GOTTA GET IT.
COME ON, RED. COME ON, RED.
TOO LATE, YOUNG LADY.
PLACE YOUR BETS. BANK SIDE, PLAYER SIDE.
translation.zh: 下注 庄家 客人

translation.en: ALL SET? CARDS, PLEASE.
TURNING FOR THE PLAYERS.
PLAYER DRAWS NOTHING.
AND SET?
PLAYER SIDE, BANKER SIDE.
ANY OTHER BETS?
WHO'S THAT GUY?
HE'S A DAMN BILLIONAIRE.
translation.zh: 他是亿万富翁 有钱的龟儿子

translation.en: THAT'S A RICH SON OF A BITCH RIGHT THERE.
translation.zh: 他是亿万富翁 有钱的龟儿子 他已经输了一百多万

translation.en: HE'S DOWN OVER A MILLION DOLLARS ALREADY.
SEE THE LITTLE GOLD THINGS HE'S PLAYING WITH?
translation.zh: 看到他把玩的金筹码没有？

translation.en: $10,000 APIECE.
EVERY TIME HE LAYS ONE DOWN, 10,000 BIG ONES.
translation.zh: 每下一片就是一万块钱

translation.en: LOOK AT HIM, HOW COOL HE IS.
HE MUST GET MORE PUSSY THAN YOU CAN SHAKE A STICK AT.
translation.zh: 他的马子比你多许多 我无意冒犯

translation.en: SORRY. DIDN'T MEAN TO OFFEND YOU.
[DEALER] PLAYER WINS. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE, YOU GAMBLING?
YEAH. LET'S GO.
STICK AROUND AND GAMBLE A LITTLE. EXCUSE ME.
EXCUSE ME.
WOULD YOU MIND LENDING ME YOUR WIFE? IS THAT YOUR WIFE?
translation.zh: 请你把老婆借给我 好吗？

translation.en: EXCUSE ME?
FOR LUCK.
WELL, YOU'D HAVE TO ASK HER.
MAY I?
I DON'T THINK IT'S A GOOD IDEA.
WE SHOULD JUST GO.
translation.zh: 我不要 我们走吧 只要一下子

translation.en: JUST FOR A MOMENT?
GO AHEAD. IT MIGHT BE FUN. WHAT DO WE GOT TO LOSE?
translation.zh: 去吧 好玩！反正没有损失

translation.en: WELL? GO SEE WHAT HAPPENS. YEAH, GO AHEAD.
translation.zh: -怎么样？ -叫她去 看看怎样？

translation.en: THANK YOU.
SEE IF YOU CAN GET A LITTLE OF THAT MONEY FROM HIM.
translation.zh: 看你能不能从他身上拿到钱

translation.en: DO YOU THINK SHE'LL EVER COME BACK?
I WAS JUST BULLSHITTING YA.
HAVE A SEAT. I'VE BEEN LOSING ALL DAY LONG.
translation.zh: 请坐 我已输了一整天

translation.en: THEN YOU APPEARED, AND I WIN MY FIRST HAND.
translation.zh: 你出现我就赢了一把 你带给我好运

translation.en: I'D SAY THAT'S A SIGN... WOULDN'T YOU?
translation.zh: 我说这是好兆头 你说呢？

translation.en: WOULD YOU LIKE A DRINK? NO, THANK YOU.
translation.zh: -你要喝什么吗？ -不用 谢谢

translation.en: CANDY?
PLACE YOUR BETS.
JUST LIKE THAT?
JUST LIKE THAT.
NOT LIKE THAT.
SORRY.
ALL BETS SET? CARDS, PLEASE.
translation.zh: 都已经下了注 请发牌

translation.en: TURNING FOR THE PLAYERS.
NOW, WHAT WE WANT...
translation.zh: 给客人牌 现在我们要的是…

translation.en: WHAT WE NEED...
IS A 9.
MM, WE DON'T LIKE THAT.
PLAYER DRAWS NOTHING. CARDS FOR THE BANK, PLEASE.
translation.zh: 客人不补牌 庄家要补牌

translation.en: BANK'S A WINNER WITH A NATURAL 8.
translation.zh: 庄家以八点赢…付给庄家

translation.en: I GUESS I'M NOT SO LUCKY AFTER ALL.
DO YOU LIKE CARDS? UH...NOT ESPECIALLY.
translation.zh: -你喜欢玩牌吗？ -不是特别喜欢

translation.en: WISH I'D ASKED YOU SOONER. DICE?
translation.zh: 我该早一点问 股子呢？

translation.en: YEAH, I GUESS.
SAM.
MR. G?
ONE. EXCUSE ME, MR. G.
WELL, MAYBE I SHOULD GO.
THIS SHOULDN'T TAKE TOO LONG.
THIS.
NOW...
I HOPE YOU FIND THIS INTERESTING.
PIT. TADROSS.
YES, SIR.
translation.zh: 皮特 我是罗斯 是 已经到了

translation.en: YES, SIR, IT'S HERE NOW.
YES, SIR.
IT GOES FOR $1 MILLION.
IT'S A BET.
HERE YOU ARE, MR. G-- $1 MILLION.
BET IT ALL.
COMING OUT. CRAP 11 OR ANY 7. THIS TIME IT IS A COME OUT ROLL.
translation.zh: 掷出十一或是七点就赢 掷股子吧

translation.en: HOME MUCH GOES? NOW GET 'EM DOWN.
translation.zh: 掷出十一或是七点就赢 掷股子吧 挑两颗

translation.en: NOW JUST THROW A 7.
IF YOU WANT TO THROW AN 11, THAT'S ALL RIGHT, TOO.
AREN'T YOU FORGETTING SOMETHING?
EVERYONE.
THINK I OUGHT TO QUIT NOW?
I THINK I SHOULD.
CREDIT MY ACCOUNT.
EXCUSE ME. EXCUSE ME. EXCUSE ME.
translation.zh: 对不起 不可思议 天啊！

translation.en: THAT WAS INCREDIBLE. OH, MY GOD! UNBELIEVABLE.
HI. JOHN GAGE.
translation.zh: 你好 我是约翰凯吉

translation.en: OH, HI. DAVID MURPHY.
HI, DAVID. UH, CONGRATULATIONS.
THIS IS MY WIFE DIANA. I GUESS YOU MET.
translation.zh: 我老婆黛安娜 你见过

translation.en: HI. DIANA? DIANA.
HI. THANK YOU BOTH.
VERY GENEROUS OF YOU, DAVID. ARE YOU STAYING AT THE HOTEL?
translation.zh: 你们真大方 住这家饭店吗？

translation.en: OH, NO. ACTUALLY, WE'RE JUST LEAVING.
translation.zh: -不是 我们正要离去 -要走了吗？

translation.en: YES, WE'RE ON OUR WAY HOME. NO, DON'T DO THAT. WE GOT TO CELEBRATE.
translation.zh: -对 我们要走了 -不要走 我们来庆功

translation.en: LET ME ARRANGE A ROOM FOR YOU HERE.
THAT'S VERY NICE, BUT-- NO, I INSIST.
translation.zh: -你真好 不过… -别走 我坚持！

translation.en: PLEASE. IT'S THE LEAST I CAN DO, O.K.?
translation.zh: 拜托 这是我唯一能做的

translation.en: JUST SIGN FOR IT, ANYTHING YOU WANT.
translation.zh: 真的 要什么尽管签字

translation.en: OH, THERE'S SOME LOVELY SHOPS OFF THE LOBBY.
HAVE YOU SEEN 'EM?
LET'S GO.
HOW ABOUT THAT?
WHAT DO YOU THINK?
GODFATHER?
YOU WON A MILLION DOLLARS TODAY.
HE WON IT.
HONEY, YOU WON IT FOR HIM.
THIS FEELS NICE.
AH, DON'T GET IT. JUST STAY RIGHT HERE.
translation.zh: 不要应门 留在这里

translation.en: O.K.
HELLO. WILLIAM SHACKLEFORD.
translation.zh: 你好 我是威廉薛克福

translation.en: OH, HI. DAVID MURPHY.
FOR MRS. MURPHY, FROM JOHN GAGE.
translation.zh: 约翰凯吉送给墨菲太太的

translation.en: OH, WELL, THANK HIM FOR US.
I'LL DO THAT. UH, MR. GAGE IS HOSTING A GATHERING TONIGHT
translation.zh: 凯吉先生在九号套房请客

translation.en: IN HIS SUITE AT 9:00. IF YOU CAN FIND THE TIME
translation.zh: 凯吉先生在九号套房请客 若你们抽空出席 他会很高兴

translation.en: IN YOUR SCHEDULE, HE'D BE MOST PLEASED.
translation.zh: 若你们抽空出席 他会很高兴

translation.en: LOOK WHAT YOU GOT. WHAT?
A GIFT FROM GAGE.
REALLY?
WELL, OPEN IT UP.
HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT?
I--I SAW IT IN A STORE DOWNSTAIRS.
LUCKY FOR HIM YOU LIKE BLACK.
YEAH.
...PAST AND FUTURE, AND JUST CHECK INTO A HOTEL
translation.zh: 没有过去 也没有将来 只是随便住个酒店

translation.en: AND START OVER.
THAT'S STRANGE, AM I RIGHT?
WHO IS THAT GUY SHACKLEFORD?
HE'S SOMEONE WHO WORKS FOR ME.
SOMEONE I TRUST.
HE KILLED SOMEONE ONCE.
TELL ME...
translation.zh: 告诉我 你认为自己在…

translation.en: WHERE DO YOU SEE YOURSELF IN, SAY, 10 YEARS?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你认为自己在… 十年后会怎样？

translation.en: WELL, I WOULDN'T MIND BEING A BILLIONAIRE LIKE YOURSELF.
translation.zh: 我不介意像你当亿万富翁

translation.en: NO--NICE SHOT-- I MEAN BEYOND MONEY.
translation.zh: 这球打得好 我是说钱以外

translation.en: WHAT WOULD SATISFY YOU COMPLETELY,
translation.zh: 什么事会满足你？夜里好睡？

translation.en: WHAT, ARE YOU SAYING YOU'RE NOT SATISFIED?
WHO IS?
I AM.
SHE MEAN IT?
I HOPE SO.
WELL, THEN, YOU MAY NOT HAVE WON IN VEGAS,
translation.zh: 虽然你在赌城没赢钱 但你很幸运

translation.en: BUT YOU'RE A LUCKY MAN.
translation.zh: 虽然你在赌城没赢钱 但你很幸运 虽然我有钱、有保障、有事业

translation.en: 'CAUSE I GOT MONEY, SECURITY, BUSINESSES,
translation.zh: 虽然我有钱、有保障、有事业

translation.en: BUT YOU HAVE SOMETHING THAT I JUST DON'T HAVE.
I GUESS THERE'S LIMITS TO WHAT MONEY CAN BUY.
NOT MANY.
WELL, SOME THINGS AREN'T FOR SALE.
SUCH AS?
WELL, YOU CAN'T BUY PEOPLE.
THAT'S NAIVE, DIANA. I BUY PEOPLE EVERY DAY.
translation.zh: 这话太天真 我每天都收买人

translation.en: IN BUSINESS, MAYBE, BUT NOT WHEN REAL EMOTIONS ARE INVOLVED.
translation.zh: 生意上也许可以 但涉及感情就不能了

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU SAYING-- YOU CAN'T BUY LOVE?
THAT'S A BIT OF A CLICHE, DON'T YOU THINK?
IT'S ABSOLUTELY TRUE.
IS IT? WHAT DO YOU THINK?
I AGREE WITH DIANA. YOU DO?
WELL, LET'S TEST THE CLICHE.
SUPPOSE...
I WERE TO OFFER YOU $1 MILLION...
FOR ONE NIGHT WITH YOUR WIFE?
I'D ASSUME YOU WERE KIDDING.
LET'S PRETEND I'M NOT.
WHAT WOULD YOU SAY?
HE'D TELL YOU TO GO TO HELL.
I DIDN'T HEAR HIM.
I'D TELL YOU TO GO TO HELL.
THAT'S A REFLEX ANSWER
translation.zh: 这是反射性的答案 因为你认为这是假设

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU VIEW IT AS HYPOTHETICAL.
translation.zh: 这是反射性的答案 因为你认为这是假设 如果说真的有这笔钱

translation.en: BUT LET'S SAY THERE WERE REAL MONEY BEHIND IT.
I'M NOT KIDDING. A MILLION DOLLARS.
translation.zh: 我不是说笑 一百万元

translation.en: NOW, THE NIGHT WOULD COME AND GO, BUT THE MONEY COULD LAST A LIFETIME.
translation.zh: 一夜转眼就过去 但这笔钱却可以过一辈子

translation.en: THINK OF IT.
A MILLION DOLLARS.
A LIFETIME OF SECURITY,
FOR ONE NIGHT.
DON'T ANSWER RIGHT AWAY,
BUT CONSIDER IT--
SERIOUSLY.
WE'RE POSITIVE, O.K.?
WELL, THEN YOU'VE ANSWERED MY QUESTION,
AND YOU'VE PROVED YOUR POINT. THERE ARE LIMITS TO WHAT MONEY CAN BUY.
translation.zh: 而且证明了有些东西钱买不到

translation.en: IT'S LATE, AND I HATE TO ADMIT IT, BUT I HAVE A MEETING.
translation.zh: 不早了 我要赴另一个约会

translation.en: MAY I HAVE ONE DANCE?
OF COURSE, WITH YOUR PERMISSION.
YOU KNOW SOMETHING? I THINK YOU BETTER GET ON TO THAT MEETING.
translation.zh: 我认为你还是赴约的好

translation.en: YOU DON'T WANT TO MISS OUT ON YOUR NEXT BILLION.
translation.zh: 别错过了赚另一笔十亿元

translation.en: UNDERSTOOD. I WOULDN'T PART WITH HER EITHER.
translation.zh: 我了解 换了我也不愿和她分开

translation.en: GOOD NIGHT.
CAN'T SLEEP?
NO.
ME, NEITHER.
I JUST KEEP THINKING ABOUT IT.
IT'S SO WEIRD, ISN'T IT?
YEAH.
DAVID, I THINK YOU WANT ME TO DO IT.
translation.zh: 大卫 我认为你想要我做

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? DON'T BE RIDICULOUS.
WELL, MAYBE WE SHOULD JUST TALK ABOUT IT.
I DON'T WANT YOU TO DO IT.
BUT YOU'D LET ME DO IT. NO.
WHY? DO YOU WANT TO DO IT?
NO...
BUT I WOULD.
I'D DO IT FOR YOU.
FOR ME?
I CAN'T BELIEVE WE'RE EVEN TALKING ABOUT THIS.
translation.zh: 想不到我们竟然讨论这种事

translation.en: THINK ABOUT WHAT THIS MONEY COULD DO FOR US,
translation.zh: 想想那笔钱能为我们做的事

translation.en: WHAT IT COULD DO FOR OUR FUTURE.
YOU COULD FINISH YOUR HOUSE.
YOU COULD PAY YOUR DAD BACK, GET RID OF OUR DEBTS.
translation.zh: 可以还你爸钱和其他债务

translation.en: AFTER ALL, IT WOULDN'T MEAN ANYTHING.
IT'S JUST MY BODY.
IT'S NOT MY MIND. IT'S NOT MY HEART.
YOU THINK WE COULD... DO SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
translation.zh: 你认为我们可以做这种事？

translation.en: LOOK, WE BOTH SLEPT WITH OTHER PEOPLE
translation.zh: 我们在婚前都跟别人睡过

translation.en: BEFORE WE WERE MARRIED, RIGHT? YEAH.
SO WE'D JUST HAVE TO LOOK AT IT LIKE THAT.
translation.zh: 所以我们要把事情看成那样

translation.en: FOR GOD'S SAKE, IF I CAN SLEEP WITH BUBBA,
translation.zh: 我跟猪八睡过 我能跟他睡 也能跟别人睡

translation.en: I CAN SLEEP WITH ANYONE.
COME ON, YOU KNEW.
NO, I DIDN'T KNOW THAT. WHEN DID YOU SLEEP WITH BUBBA?
WHEN YOU WERE OFF SLEEPING WITH THAT SLUT OLIVIA DAIGLE.
translation.zh: 你跟荡妇狄歌上床的时候

translation.en: OLIVIA DEAGLE. EXCUSE ME. OLIVIA BEAGLE.
translation.zh: -她叫蒂歌 她不是荡妇 -对不起 蒂歌

translation.en: SHE WASN'T A SLUT.
translation.zh: -她叫蒂歌 她不是荡妇 -对不起 蒂歌 让我进被子里

translation.en: LET ME IN.
SHE WASN'T A SLUT. YES, SHE WAS.
NO, SHE WASN'T... UNFORTUNATELY.
translation.zh: 她不是荡妇！ 很可惜

translation.en: THANK GOD WE CAN LAUGH ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 我们还笑得出来 谢天谢地

translation.en: THAT'S EASY TO SAY NOW-- AFTER.
translation.zh: 现在说来容易 但是事后…

translation.en: WE JUST HAVE TO FORGET IT EVER HAPPENED...
translation.zh: 事后必须当作没这回事

translation.en: AND NEVER DISCUSS IT, NOT EVEN ONCE...
translation.zh: 绝口不提 一次也不能提

translation.en: I MEAN, BECAUSE NOTHING WILL HAVE HAPPENED...
NOTHING THAT MATTERS, ANYWAY.
WE HAVE A BRILLIANT SCRIPT. REALLY, VERY SPECIAL. MAJOR.
translation.zh: 我们有一部好剧本 非常特别

translation.en: IT'S A COMEBACK VEHICLE FOR DIANA ROSS.
translation.zh: 黛安娜露丝要东山再起 就全仗它了

translation.en: BILLY RAY CYRUS. IT'S KIND OF A STAR IS BORN--
translation.zh: 类似比利赛鲁斯的“新星诞生”

translation.en: SO...YOUR FIRST SCREENPLAY SOLD FOR HALF A MILLION.
translation.zh: 你第一部剧本卖了五十万

translation.en: SHOULD HAVE BEEN 2. EXCEPT OUR LAWYER CAVED IN ON US.
translation.zh: -应该卖两百万 -都怪律师让步

translation.en: THAT WON'T HAPPEN AGAIN.
translation.zh: 这种事不会重演 我们要找强悍精明的律师

translation.en: WE'LL GET A LAWYER THAT'S TOUGH, SAVVY.
translation.zh: 我们要找强悍精明的律师

translation.en: SOMEONE THAT'LL STEP ON HIS GRANDMOTHER FOR US.
translation.zh: 愿意为了我们背叛祖宗

translation.en: DAVID MURPHY WOULD LIKE TO SPEAK TO YOU.
translation.zh: 格林 墨菲找你 说有急事

translation.en: HE SAYS IT'S URGENT.
OOH. PUT HIM ON THE SPEAKER.
translation.zh: 接到扩音器来 他是我大学的哥儿们 不会谈很久

translation.en: THIS IS AN OLD COLLEGE BUDDY. ONLY TAKE A SECOND.
translation.zh: 他是我大学的哥儿们 不会谈很久 -格林 -大卫 我在会客 什么事？

translation.en: DAVEY, I'M IN A MEETING. WHAT'S UP?
translation.zh: -格林 -大卫 我在会客 什么事？ 听着 我们有宗买卖要你处理

translation.en: WE NEED YOU TO CLOSE A DEAL.
translation.zh: 听着 我们有宗买卖要你处理

translation.en: WHAT KIND OF DEAL? A BIG DEAL. VERY BIG DEAL.
translation.zh: -什么买卖？ -大买卖 很大的买卖

translation.en: OOH. BIG DEAL. GO ON.
WE'RE IN VEGAS AT THE HILTON.
translation.zh: 我们在赌城的希尔顿饭店

translation.en: WE MET JOHN GAGE. KNOW WHO HE IS?
translation.zh: 结识了约翰凯吉 你知道他吗

translation.en: SURE, I KNOW WHO HE IS.
translation.zh: 当然知道 他是亿万富翁

translation.en: HE'S A BILLIONAIRE AND A MAJOR POON HOUND.
HE IS?
MM-HMM. GO ON.
HE OFFERED US, UH, A MILLION DOLLARS.
A MILLION DOLLARS? FOR WHAT, YOUR KIDNEYS?
translation.zh: 一百万？干什么？买你的肾？

translation.en: FOR ONE NIGHT WITH DIANA.
WHAT DO YOU MEAN? ONE NIGHT, LIKE...
translation.zh: 什么意思？一夜 就像…

translation.en: YES.
COULD YOU EXCUSE ME FOR A SECOND?
L-L-LET ME GET THIS STRAIGHT. UM, HE OFFERED YOU A MILLION DOLLARS
FOR A NIGHT WITH YOUR WIFE,
translation.zh: 他出一百万元 要你老婆陪一夜？

translation.en: AS IN YOUR WIFE DIANA? AND YOU AGREED TO IT?
translation.zh: 要你老婆黛安娜？你答应了？

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO SAY. HOW COULD YOU DO SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
translation.zh: 我不知说什么好 你怎可以这样？

translation.en: HOW COULD YOU NEGOTIATE WITHOUT ME?
translation.zh: 谈判怎么可以少了我？ 没带律师 绝不可以跟人谈判

translation.en: NEVER NEGOTIATE WITHOUT YOUR LAWYER.
translation.zh: 没带律师 绝不可以跟人谈判

translation.en: NEVER! FOR A WOMAN LIKE DIANA,
translation.zh: 像黛安娜这种女人 我起码能要到两百万

translation.en: I COULD HAVE GOTTEN YOU AT LEAST 2 MILLION!
translation.zh: 像黛安娜这种女人 我起码能要到两百万 显然你不想吃亏之后再吃亏

translation.en: OBVIOUSLY. YOU DON'T WANT TO GET SCREWED
translation.zh: 显然你不想吃亏之后再吃亏

translation.en: AND THEN SCREWED. HEY. STAY, PLEASE. THIS IS DAMAGE CONTROL.
translation.zh: 请留步 这是亡羊补牢

translation.en: TWO SECONDS. EAT COOKIES.
translation.zh: 等一下 她送饼干来了

translation.en: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND. WE'VE HEARD ENOUGH.
YOU'RE HIRED.
YOU'RE OUR MAN. WE LOVE YOUR STYLE.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢你的作风 好！葛拉迪 跟他们订时间下周联络

translation.en: GLADYS, CHECK THE GENTLEMEN'S SCHEDULES. CALL ME NEXT WEEK?
translation.zh: 好！葛拉迪 跟他们订时间下周联络

translation.en: WEDNESDAY? WEDNESDAY GOOD?
SEE YOU THEN. GREAT.
THANKS FOR COMING. O.K.
translation.zh: -到时见 谢谢 -谢谢你 谢谢你

translation.en: NO, THANK YOU. NO, THANK YOU.
UM, DAVID, BEFORE WE GO ANY FURTHER,
translation.zh: 好 在我们继续讨论之前…

translation.en: LET'S, UM... LET'S GET THE MORAL ISSUE OUT OF THE WAY.
LEAVE THAT TO US.
NO, I WAS REFERRING TO MY FEE. I GET 5%.
translation.zh: 不是 我是指事务费 我要抽百分之五

translation.en: DO YOU WANT TO ELABORATE ON THE VERIFICATION CLAUSE?
translation.zh: 你要我详细说明条约内容吗？

translation.en: "VERIFICATION." UM, THAT MEANS YOU PAY
translation.zh: 条约内容… 就算你跟她没有发生关系 也要付钱

translation.en: EVEN IF THE RELATIONSHIP ISN'T CONSUMMATED.
translation.zh: 就算你跟她没有发生关系 也要付钱

translation.en: YOU MEAN IF I'M IMPOTENT.
translation.zh: 你是说假如我是性无能

translation.en: IT'S IMPORTANT FOR A LAWYER TO COVER CONTINGENCIES.
translation.zh: 当律师有必要巨细靡遗

translation.en: I CAN LIVE WITH THAT. THE JOHN GARFIELD CLAUSE?
translation.zh: 我可以接受…约翰盖菲条款？

translation.en: THAT'S IF YOU DIE IN THE ACT.
I HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH THAT, EITHER. CAN I HAVE YOUR PEN?
translation.zh: 这个我也没意见 笔借一下？

translation.en: YOU'RE PRETTY GOOD, YOU KNOW? THANK YOU.
YOU SHOULD COME WORK FOR ME.
WE HAVE A DEAL.
A MILLION DOLLARS WILL BE DEPOSITED IN YOUR CASINO ACCOUNT IN THE MORNING.
translation.zh: 我明早会把一百万元 存入你在赌场的户头

translation.en: SO.
SO.
SO.
YOU CAN GO.
GENTLEMEN, I THINK IT'S TIME FOR MEN OF GOOD WILL
translation.zh: 各位 我想善意人士应该…

translation.en: TO...TAKE LEAVE OF ONE ANOTHER.
IT'S ALL RIGHT. I DON'T BITE.
translation.zh: 不要怕 我不会咬人

translation.en: SO, UH... WHAT, SHOULD I GO UNDRESS?
CHEER UP. YOU GOT TO FIND
translation.zh: 开心点 你得看开一点

translation.en: A MORE CREATIVE WAY TO THINK ABOUT THIS.
translation.zh: 开心点 你得看开一点 看作这是《约会游戏》的一集

translation.en: LOOK AT IT LIKE AN EPISODE OF THE DATING GAME
translation.zh: 看作这是《约会游戏》的一集

translation.en: THAT WENT A LITTLE BIT AWRY OR SOMETHING.
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN,
WE WISH TO WELCOME YOU TO OUR JAMBOREE.
I COULDN'T BELIEVE IT.
I KNOW WE COULD HAVE GOTTEN 2 MILLION.
translation.zh: 我知道可以抬高到两百万

translation.en: HERE'S YOUR BUDDHA.
NO POINT GETTING OUT THE CRYING TOWEL. YOU GOT A MILLION BUCKS, BUDDY.
translation.zh: 你没必要哭丧着脸 你有一百万元了

translation.en: A MILLION BUCKS.
SHE'S AN AMAZING WOMAN.
translation.zh: 她真是个了不起的女人

translation.en: I COULDN'T HAVE GOTTEN 500 FOR MY GIRLFRIEND,
translation.zh: 她真是个了不起的女人 我的女友五百元也没人要

translation.en: NOT THAT I'D DO THAT--
BUT IT'S O.K. THAT YOU DID.
THIS IS A DIFFERENT SITUATION, AND SHE AGREED TO IT. YOU GOTTA REMEMBER THAT.
translation.zh: 情形不同 记住 她同意的

translation.en: AND IT'S NOT LIKE IT'S HARD DUTY. HELL, HE'S A GREAT-LOOKING GUY.
translation.zh: 这又不是吃苦受折磨 他是个很帅的男人

translation.en: FOR A MILLION BUCKS, I'D SLEEP WITH HIM.
translation.zh: 有一百万元我也愿意陪他睡

translation.en: MAYBE NOT.
HEY, BUDDY.
OH, GOD.
COME ON!
WHAT HAVE I DONE?
WHAT HAVE I DONE?
D! IT'S ME!
D! D!
¿QUE PASA, SEñOR? WHERE'S MY WIFE?
NO SE, SEñOR. SE FUERON.
DIANA!
WHAT HAPPENED TO HER? WHERE'D THEY GO?
UP, UP, UP.
UP WHERE?
HELICOPTERO. HELICOPTERO.
D!
D!
THEY SENT FOR ME.
THEY SAID YOU WERE READY.
COME HERE.
YOU MISSED A BUTTON.
THANK YOU.
I WANT TO SHOW YOU SOMETHING.
WHAT HAPPENED? LIGHTS WENT OUT.
I SEE THAT. WHY?
LOOK.
CAN YOU TURN THOSE OFF, TOO?
I'M WORKING ON IT.
WHO MADE THE DECISION?
WE BOTH DID.
DO IT FOR YOUR OWN REASONS, OR DON'T DO IT.
translation.zh: 为你自己的理由做 否则不要做

translation.en: YOU DON'T KNOW HIM. I KNOW HE DIDN'T STOP YOU.
translation.zh: -你不了解他 -我知道他没有阻止你

translation.en: NOW, IF YOU WERE MINE...
I WOULDN'T SHARE YOU WITH ANYONE.
translation.zh: 我不会与任何人分享你

translation.en: YOU HAVE NO RIGHT TO JUDGE DAVID.
YOU'RE THE ONE WHO HAS TO BUY WOMEN.
YOU THINK I HAVE TO BUY WOMEN?
translation.zh: 你认为我要花钱才有女人吗？

translation.en: WHY ME, THEN?
I BOUGHT YOU BECAUSE YOU SAID YOU COULDN'T BE BOUGHT.
translation.zh: 因为你说别人买不到你

translation.en: I CAN'T BE BOUGHT.
WE'RE JUST GOING TO FUCK,
translation.zh: 你没有买到我 我们只是做爱

translation.en: AS I UNDERSTAND IT.
YOU MIGHT ENJOY IT.
DON'T BET ON IT.
I THINK I WILL.
HEADS, WE DO.
TAILS, WE CALL THE WHOLE THING OFF,
TURN THE BOAT AROUND, GO HOME. NO HARD FEELINGS.
translation.zh: 把船掉头回家 不伤感情

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU SAY?
IT'S YOUR PARTY.
IT'S MY LUCKY DOLLAR...
SO I CAN'T LOSE.
TRUST ME.
NOTHING'S GOING TO HAPPEN YOU DON'T CHOOSE.
translation.zh: 你若是不选择就不会发生

translation.en: [DIANA] I TOLD MYSELF IT WAS OVER,
translation.zh: 我对自己说事情过去了

translation.en: LIKE A DREAM THAT VANISHES IN THE MORNING LIGHT,
AND IN TIME, ENOUGH TIME, I WOULD FORGET.
ALL RIGHT.
YEAH, A LITTLE FIXER-UPPER SOUTH OF WILSHIRE.
translation.zh: 我们在威尔夏郡南方有间房子

translation.en: LOOK, I'VE GOT PEOPLE HERE.
I'LL TALK TO YOU LATER.
SORRY. I'M HERE FOR YOU NOW.
translation.zh: 我现在可以跟你们谈了

translation.en: TWO ACRES ON ALTA LOMA. ALL RIGHT,
translation.zh: 阿尔他洛马的八千平方米地

translation.en: ALTA VISTA.
VISTA. IT'S RIGHT HERE-- MURPHY PROPERTY.
WE'VE BEEN LATE WITH PAYMENTS. WE WANT TO SETTLE UP.
translation.zh: 我们晚了一点付款 要来补缴

translation.en: I DON'T THINK THAT'S POSSIBLE.
WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -抵押贷款逾两个月未偿还

translation.en: WELL, THE MORTGAGE IS TWO MONTHS IN DEFAULT,
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -抵押贷款逾两个月未偿还 那块地已转卖给另一买主

translation.en: AND IT APPEARS THAT THE PROPERTY IS IN CONTRACT TO ANOTHER PARTY.
translation.zh: 那块地已转卖给另一买主

translation.en: TO ANOTHER PARTY? WHO?
THAT'S PRIVILEGED INFORMATION.
WE CALLED SPECIFICALLY FOR AN EXTENSION.
EXPIRED TWO DAYS AGO. THE EXTENSION
IF YOU DON'T MAKE A PAYMENT, THE BANK CAN REPOSSESS.
translation.zh: 你们没付款 银行可以收回

translation.en: WITHOUT PRIOR NOTICE? CAN THEY DO THAT?
translation.zh: 未事先通知也可以收回吗？

translation.en: UNDER THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT,
translation.zh: 按这合约 他们可以不预警

translation.en: THEY DON'T HAVE TO GIVE US A WARNING.
translation.zh: 按这合约 他们可以不预警 银行在三号曾打电话给你们

translation.en: BUT IN FACT, AN ATTEMPT WAS MADE
translation.zh: 银行在三号曾打电话给你们

translation.en: TO CALL YOU ON THE 3rd,
AND A REGISTERED LETTER WAS ATTEMPTED ON THE 4th.
translation.zh: 四号有挂号信通知 显然家里没有人

translation.en: THERE WAS NO ONE HOME. APPARENTLY
Both: WE WERE OUT OF TOWN.
translation.zh: 我们出远门了 我很抱歉 但打瞌睡的输了

translation.en: WELL, I AM SORRY, BUT, UH... YOU SNOOZE, YOU LOSE.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但打瞌睡的输了

translation.en: YOU SNOOZE, YOU LOSE.
YOU SNOOZE, YOU LOSE?
translation.zh: -打瞌睡的输了？ -那是一种譬喻

translation.en: IT'S AN EXPRESSION. OH, THAT'S BEAUTIFUL.
translation.zh: 打瞌睡的输了？譬喻得真好

translation.en: YOU SNOOZE, YOU LOSE. THAT'S BULLSHIT!
THIS IS BULLSHIT, MAN!
DON'T DEAL WITH THESE PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 不要跟这些人交易 他们出卖我们 也会出卖你们

translation.en: THEY SOLD US OUT!
translation.zh: 他们出卖我们 也会出卖你们

translation.en: WANT TO HELP ME IN THE GARDEN?
O.K.
OUR TOMATOES ARE LOOKING GOOD,
translation.zh: 我们的番茄好漂亮 对吧？

translation.en: DAVID?
WHAT'S GRYPHON?
[CORRECTS PRONUNCIATION] GRYPHON.
WHERE'D YOU HEAR THAT NAME?
YOU HAVE A BOX OF MATCHES.
WE SAID WE WOULDN'T TALK ABOUT IT.
WELL, NOW I WANT TO TALK ABOUT IT.
DON'T YOU?
NO.
I THOUGHT I COULD FORGET ABOUT THIS,
translation.zh: 我以为我能忘掉 但是忘不了

translation.en: SO I THINK...
MAYBE IF WE JUST TALK ABOUT IT, WE CAN PUT IT BEHIND US.
translation.zh: 也许我们讲开了 我就能抛开这件事

translation.en: GRYPHON'S A BOAT.
HE TOOK YOU TO A BOAT? IN NEVADA?
translation.zh: 他带你到船上？在内华达？

translation.en: WE FLEW TO SANTA BARBARA.
WHAT KIND OF BOAT? A BIG BOAT.
AND THEN WHAT? AND THEN NOTHING.
WHERE DID YOU GET THE MATCHES?
HAVE YOU BEEN GOING THROUGH MY BAG?
WHY? WHAT'S IN YOUR BAG?
translation.zh: 怎么？你皮包里有什么吗？

translation.en: I'M NOT GOING TO TALK ABOUT THIS.
translation.zh: 我不要谈这件事 我不要！

translation.en: WHAT?
WHO ARE YOU TALKING TO?
MY MOTHER.
AND, UH, WHAT DID MOM HAVE TO SAY?
NOTHING. SHE WASN'T THERE.
HOW COULD YOU BE TALKING TO HER IF SHE WASN'T THERE?
translation.zh: 她不在 你怎么跟她讲话？

translation.en: I WAS TRYING TO TALK TO HER, BUT I DIDN'T REACH HER.
translation.zh: 我想找她讲话 但找不到她

translation.en: SHE WASN'T IN AFTER 10:00?
NO, SHE'S NOT. IF YOU DON'T BELIEVE ME, WOULD YOU LIKE TO TALK TO HER YOURSELF?
translation.zh: 你要是不相信 你来跟她讲

translation.en: WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH YOU?
WHAT IS THAT?
YOU KNOW WHAT IT IS.
WHERE DID YOU GET THIS? IN YOUR WALLET.
WELL, I'VE NEVER SEEN IT BEFORE. IT WAS RIGHT THERE IN THE OLD SECRET COMPARTMENT.
translation.zh: -我从来没见过 -它就在秘密的夹层里

translation.en: DAVID, I DON'T EVEN USE THAT.
translation.zh: 大卫 我不用皮夹的夹层

translation.en: HAVE YOU BEEN SEEING HIM?
NO, I HAVEN'T.
YOU CAN'T STOP THINKING ABOUT HIM, CAN YOU?
translation.zh: 你忘不了他 是吗？ -你不让我忘记 -你能忘吗？

translation.en: YOU WON'T LET ME.
WHAT WERE YOU DOING GOING THROUGH MY WALLET?
I DON'T TRUST YOU.
I DON'T TRUST YOU EITHER.
translation.zh: -我信不过你 -我也信不过你 那么扯平了

translation.en: WELL, THEN WE'RE EVEN.
I HAD TO DO SOMETHING.
I WANTED TO MAKE SOMETHING GOOD OUT OF ALL WE'D DONE WRONG.
translation.zh: 我想做点正确的事去弥补过错

translation.en: I DECIDED TO TRY AND BUY OUR LAND BACK.
translation.zh: 我决定要买回我们的地

translation.en: I JUST NEED THE GUY'S NAME.
translation.zh: 我要找到那买主 给他好价钱

translation.en: I WANT TO MAKE HIM AN OFFER.
translation.zh: 我要找到那买主 给他好价钱 -我不能这样做 -我也不想麻烦你

translation.en: I'LL GET KILLED FOR THIS, DIANA. I DON'T WANT YOU TO GET IN TROUBLE.
translation.zh: -我不能这样做 -我也不想麻烦你

translation.en: I REALLY APPRECIATE IT.
543 ALTA VISTA. THERE IT IS RIGHT THERE.
BACK UP. HERE WE GO. 543 ALTA VISTA.
translation.zh: 好 阿尔他维斯塔543号

translation.en: OH, MY GOD. LOOK AT THAT.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个人绝不会卖地

translation.en: THIS GUY'S NEVER GOING TO SELL, DIANA.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个人绝不会卖地 我刚看见他上电视

translation.en: I JUST SAW THIS GUY ON TV.
YOU BASTARD! YOU STOLE OUR PROPERTY!
translation.zh: 混蛋 你抢我们的地

translation.en: GENTLEMEN, I'D LIKE TO INTRODUCE A FRIEND OF MINE.
translation.zh: 各位 我来介绍一个朋友 我不是你的朋友

translation.en: I'M NOT YOUR FRIEND.
DIANA ADVISED ME ON A PIECE OF PROPERTY.
translation.zh: 黛安娜曾劝我买一块地

translation.en: THAT'S BULLSHIT. YOU'RE A LIAR. YOU TOOK IT I WANT IT BACK.
translation.zh: 你胡说！是你抢走的 我要讨回来

translation.en: I TELL YOU WHAT-- CAN WE HAVE A LITTLE-- THAT'S O.K. EVERYTHING'S FINE. EVERYTHING'S UNDER CONTROL.
EXCUSE ME.
I'M TAKING IT OFF.
WAIT A MINUTE.
DID YOU JUST WANT TO HURT ME?
NONSENSE. I THINK YOU'RE WONDERFUL.
THAT WAS OUR HOUSE. HOW COULD YOU DO THAT?
I GOT THERE FIRST.
I WANT YOU TO SELL IT BACK TO ME.
translation.zh: 我要你回卖给我 -你买不起 -一百万元如何？

translation.en: YOU CAN'T AFFORD IT.
HOW'S A MILLION DOLLARS?
translation.zh: -你买不起 -一百万元如何？ 两百万

translation.en: THE PRICE IS 2.
IF I HAD 2, THE PRICE WOULD BE 4, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 我若有二 你会开四 是吗？ 我见到机会就抓住了

translation.en: I SAW AN OPPORTUNITY AND I TOOK IT.
translation.zh: 我见到机会就抓住了 你有钱、有正确的直觉 但慢了一步

translation.en: YOU HAD THE MONEY, YOU HAD THE RIGHT INSTINCTS,
translation.zh: 你有钱、有正确的直觉 但慢了一步

translation.en: I WANT YOU TO WORK FOR ME. YOU GO TO HELL.
LISTEN, I MEAN IT.
NEVER.
BECAUSE I HATE YOU. NO, YOU DON'T.
YOU WISH YOU HATED ME.
HEY, D.
YOU LOOK AWFUL.
WHERE YOU BEEN?
UH, I'LL TELL YOU ABOUT IT. I'M JUST GOING TO HAVE SOME WINE FIRST.
translation.zh: 我会告诉你 先喝葡萄酒再说

translation.en: DO YOU WANT SOME?
SO WHERE YOU BEEN?
LAST NIGHT I STAYED UP FOR HOURS TRYING TO FIGURE A WAY OUT OF THIS MESS.
translation.zh: 昨夜我想了几个钟头 要设法摆平这烂摊子

translation.en: AND TODAY?
AND TODAY I SAW GAGE.
THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST, DAVID, AND FOR LISTENING.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的信任和倾听 大卫

translation.en: DID YOU FUCK HIM? NO.
BUT YOU WANTED TO, RIGHT?
DAVID, I MET HIM IN BROAD DAYLIGHT, SURROUNDED BY A BUNCH OR RICH ASSHOLES.
translation.zh: 我们大白天在众目睽睽下见面

translation.en: I DON'T BELIEVE YOU.
DAVID, HE BOUGHT OUR PROPERTY, O.K.?
translation.zh: 大卫 他买下我们的地

translation.en: THAT'S WHY I WENT TO SEE HIM. I WANTED TO FIND SOME WAY TO GET IT BACK.
translation.zh: 所以我去找他 我要买回来

translation.en: YOU--YOU HAVE NO REASON TO BE JEALOUS. I HATE HIM.
translation.zh: 你没有理由吃醋 我恨他

translation.en: D, YOU GOTTA TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED ON THAT BOAT.
translation.zh: 你必须把船上的事告诉我

translation.en: DAVID, DON'T DO THIS! TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED ON THAT BOAT.
WHY? 'CAUSE I WANT TO KNOW.
ALL RIGHT, I'LL TELL YOU.
THE MAN WAS A FUCKING STALLION. IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT ME TO SAY?
translation.zh: 他让我很爽 你想我这样说？

translation.en: WE DID IT ALL NIGHT LONG?
DOES THAT DO IT FOR YOU?
translation.zh: 我们一整夜都在做 -是真的吗？ -你并不想听真话

translation.en: IS THAT THE TRUTH? YOU DON'T WANT THE FUCKING TRUTH.
YOU WANT ME TO LIE.
translation.zh: 你要我说谎 你要我说他好逊

translation.en: YOU WANT ME TO SAY HE'S AWFUL,
translation.zh: 你要我说谎 你要我说他好逊 我说他逊 你不会相信 我有赢面吗？

translation.en: SO I'M GOING TO TELL YOU HE'S AWFUL,
translation.zh: 我说他逊 你不会相信 我有赢面吗？

translation.en: AND YOU WON'T BELIEVE ME. HOW CAN I WIN?
translation.zh: 我说他逊 你不会相信 我有赢面吗？ 只管照实说

translation.en: JUST TELL ME THE TRUTH, D.
IT WAS SEX, DAVID, JUST SEX--NOT LOVE, JUST SEX.
translation.zh: 那只有性爱 没有爱情只有性爱

translation.en: WELL, WAS IT GOOD SEX?
DON'T DO THIS, DAVID.
CAN YOU JUST TELL ME THAT, D? WAS IT GOOD? WHAT ARE YOU HESITATING FOR?
JUST TELL ME. WAS IT GOOD? WAS IT GOOD? WAS HE GOOD?
YES.
DAVID.
HEY, DON'T YOU...DON'T YOU TELL ME IT WAS JUST SEX,
BECAUSE YOU WERE ATTRACTED TO HIM ALL ALONG.
YOU KNOW THAT'S BULLSHIT. DAVID, I DID IT FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 你知道不是 我是为你做的

translation.en: DON'T YOU TELL ME YOU DID IT FOR ME. YOU DID IT FOR YOURSELF.
translation.zh: 别说你是为了我 你是为自己

translation.en: THAT'S A LIE. YOU WERE DYING TO DO IT!
THAT'S A LIE! I WOULD NEVER DO THIS FOR MYSELF. IT WAS ALL FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 我绝不是为自己 都是为了你

translation.en: DON'T LIE TO ME! YOU WERE ATTRACTED TO HIM!
translation.zh: 不要骗我 你被他吸引了

translation.en: I KNEW SOMETHING LIKE THIS WAS GOING TO HAPPEN.
translation.zh: 我就知道会发生这种事

translation.en: I GUESS YOU, UH, MAKE A DEAL WITH THE DEVIL,
AND EVENTUALLY YOU PAY THE PRICE, RIGHT?
THANKS, JEREMY. COMING FROM THE MAN
WHO CLOSED THE DEAL WITH THE DEVIL, THAT'S VERY COMFORTING.
translation.zh: 由促成这笔交易的人讲这句话 真是安慰

translation.en: GREEN.
OH, HI, DI.
I'M NOT HERE.
YEAH, HE'S RIGHT HERE. YOU WANT TO SPEAK TO HIM?
translation.zh: 他在这里 要跟他讲吗？

translation.en: NO. I--I DON'T WANT TO TALK TO HIM.
translation.zh: 不要 不想跟他讲话 听着 他爱你 你爱他…

translation.en: LOOK, SWEETIE, HE LOVES YOU. YOU LOVE HIM.
translation.zh: 听着 他爱你 你爱他…

translation.en: YOU GOT TO TRY AND WORK THIS OUT. IT'S ALL PRETTY SIMPLE, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你们要努力化解 这很简单

translation.en: EVEN I CAN'T SCREW UP. THIS IS A DEAL
translation.zh: 这种交易连我也砸不掉 转告他 钱他可以留着

translation.en: TELL HIM HE CAN KEEP THE MONEY.
translation.zh: 转告他 钱他可以留着

translation.en: I DON'T WANT ANY OF IT.
DAVEY, SHE SAID SHE DOESN'T WANT THE MONEY.
translation.zh: 大卫 她说她不要那笔钱

translation.en: WELL, I DON'T WANT THE MONEY EITHER.
I'LL TAKE IT.
I MEAN, IF NOBODY ELSE WANTS IT.
translation.zh: 我是说如果没有人要的话

translation.en: THE NEXT FEW WEEKS [DIANA] WITHOUT DAVID FELT LIKE MONTHS.
translation.zh: 我没了大卫之后 度日如年

translation.en: I GOT VERY GOOD AT STARING AT WALLS.
DIANA. DIANA. THE RECESSION HAS ENDED.
translation.zh: 黛安娜 不景气结束了

translation.en: THERE'S A FELLA OUT THERE WANTS TO SEE $10 MILLION HOMES.
translation.zh: 外面有个家伙要看千万的房子

translation.en: THERE IS A GOD.
FIND SOMEONE ELSE.
FIND SOMEONE ELSE? ARE YOU NUTS?
DO YOU KNOW WHAT THE COMMISSION IS
translation.zh: 可知千万元交易的佣金 有多少？

translation.en: ON $10 MILLION? I CAN'T DO IT.
YOU HAVE TO DO IT. YOU'RE THE BEST ONE I HAVE. YOU'RE THE ONLY ONE I HAVE.
translation.zh: 你是我最好的促销员 也是唯一一个

translation.en: THE OTHERS ARE ALL ON CARAVAN.
I'M SORRY, MR. LANGFORD. I CAN'T.
translation.zh: 蓝先生 抱歉 我不能接

translation.en: DIANA, I WOULD NEVER DREAM OF FORCING YOU TO DO ANYTHING AGAINST YOUR WILL.
translation.zh: 我也不想强迫你做不愿意的事

translation.en: EXCEPT THIS ONE TIME.
NOW MOVE YOUR ASS OR YOU'RE FIRED.
translation.zh: 现在给我去接 否则叫你滚蛋

translation.en: IF YOU THINK THIS IS GOING TO WORK, YOU UNDERESTIMATE ME.
translation.zh: 你以为这样就能得逞？太小看我了

translation.en: YOU ARE TRULY BEAUTIFUL.
WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?
LOOKING FOR A HOUSE.
WELL, THERE'S BEL-AIR, HOLMBY HILLS, BENEDICT CANYON, PACIFIC PALISADES--
translation.zh: 白崖路、比佛利山庄 班那迪峡谷、太平洋崖岸

translation.en: WHERE WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO FIRST?
PARIS.
1120 BEL-AIR ROAD, PLEASE.
THE CEILINGS ARE FRENCH GOTHIC,
RENAISSANCE PAINTINGS, AS YOU CAN SEE,
PARQUET FLOORS THROUGHOUT.
THE BATHROOMS ARE ITALIAN MARBLE.

DO YOU LIKE IT?
NO.
30 MILLION, MINIMUM.

translation.en: I KNOW.
WELL, LET'S LOOK AT IT.

translation.en: IT'S NOT FOR SALE. EVERYTHING'S FOR SALE.
THIS IS YOUR HOUSE, ISN'T IT?
DO YOU LIKE IT?

WHAT DO YOU THINK IT NEEDS?
TELL ME. HONESTLY.

translation.en: IT NEEDS YOU.
JUST FORGET IT. THIS JUST-- THIS JUST WON'T WORK.

BECAUSE FROM WHERE WE STARTED, WE'VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO.

I'VE NEVER STARTED THIS WAY EITHER.
I NEED YOU.
NO.
YOU COLLECT THINGS.
DON'T YOU?
SOMETIMES.

translation.en: NO. NO.
YOU COULDN'T BE PRESIDENT?
NO. NO.
translation.zh: -不能当总统吗？ -不能 -为什么？ -因为我们不是土生土长

translation.en: WHY NOT?
translation.zh: -为什么？ -因为我们不是土生土长

I WAS BORN IN SEOUL, KOREA.

[CLASS] SHE WAS BORN IN SEOUL, KOREA.
NOW, JU, DO YOU HAVE... SI NO ES VENDEDOR DE DROGAS,

WELCOME BACK. WHERE WERE YOU BORN?

CUE-BA.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
ISN'T THIS THE CITIZENSHIP CLASS? YES.
CAN I SIT IN?
IT'S FULL.
CUBA. CUBA. THANK YOU.
O.K., UM...
I HAVE A QUESTION.

AND--AND BEAUTIFUL.
AND TALENTED.
OOH! AND I AM CRAZY ABOUT HER.
YOU'RE FULL OF SURPRISES, AREN'T YOU?
I'M TRYING LIKE HELL.
I THINK, UH, MAYBE YOU SHOULD GO.
YOU WANT ME TO GO? NO! NO!
NICE PEOPLE. THEY WANT THE DREAM.

translation.en: WELL, THEY SAW IT IN THE FLESH TONIGHT.

translation.en: YOU HAVE CHALK ON YOUR FACE.
I HAVE SOMETHING I WANT TO SHOW YOU.
I DIDN'T KNOW WHETHER YOU LIKED BIG ONES
translation.zh: 我不知道你喜欢大狗还是小狗

translation.en: OH, YOU'RE SO BEAUTIFUL. COME HERE.
I DIDN'T HAVE MUCH TIME TO DO ANYTHING ELSE.
BUT...IT'S A START.
DANCE?
UM, I SHOULD GO.
I REMEMBER ONCE WHEN I WAS YOUNG
translation.zh: 记得年轻的时候有一次

translation.en: AND I WAS COMING BACK FROM SOMEPLACE-- A MOVIE OR SOMETHING--
AND THERE WAS A GIRL SITTING ACROSS FROM ME,
AND SHE WAS WEARING THIS DRESS
translation.zh: 她穿一件有钮扣的洋装

translation.en: THAT WAS BUTTONED CLEAR UP RIGHT TO HERE.
translation.zh: 她穿一件有钮扣的洋装 一排扣子到这里

translation.en: SHE WAS THE MOST BEAUTIFUL THING I'D EVER SEEN.
translation.zh: 她是我见过最美丽的女孩

translation.en: AND I WAS SHY THEN,
SO WHEN SHE WOULD LOOK AT ME, I WOULD LOOK AWAY.
translation.zh: 所以当她看我时 我会看别处

translation.en: THEN AFTERWARDS, WHEN I WOULD LOOK BACK, SHE WOULD LOOK AWAY.
translation.zh: 然后我看她时 她也看别处

translation.en: THEN I GOT TO WHERE I WAS GOING TO GET OFF...
AND GOT OFF. THE DOORS CLOSED.
AND AS THE TRAIN WAS PULLING AWAY,
SHE LOOKED RIGHT AT ME
AND GAVE ME THE MOST INCREDIBLE SMILE.
IT WAS AWFUL.
I WANTED TO TEAR THE DOORS OPEN.
AND I WENT BACK EVERY NIGHT, SAME TIME, FOR TWO WEEKS.
translation.zh: 我每晚同一时间回去 连续两周

translation.en: BUT SHE NEVER SHOWED UP.
THAT WAS 30 YEARS AGO...
AND I DON'T THINK THAT THERE'S A DAY THAT GOES BY THAT I DON'T THINK ABOUT HER.

translation.en: I DON'T WANT THAT TO HAPPEN AGAIN.

DIANA, TALK TO ME.

MAYBE TOMORROW WOULD BE BETTER?

THE EAGLE?

BECAUSE IT'S--I'M TALKING TO YOU FOR A SECOND.
THE CUCKOO IS AN INTERESTING BIRD BECAUSE DOESN'T HAVE ITS OWN NEST,
translation.zh: 杜鹃是很有趣的鸟 它自己不筑巢

YOU DON'T LOVE ME ANYMORE?
HAVE I EVER-- HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU I LOVE YOU?
HAVE A NICE DINNER.
GO INSIDE.
GOT HIM?
YOU'VE DONE A LOT SINCE USC.

A.I.A. AWARD, PRIX DE ROME.

WELL... I WANT TO WORK.
OVERQUALIFIED.

translation.en: NO ONE CLAIMED THE BODY. FOR DAYS,

translation.en: IS THAT BEAUTIFUL? LOOK AT THAT.
THE MONEY MEN DID NOT WEEP,
BECAUSE THE GREAT ONES
translation.zh: 因为伟大的建筑家难以应付

GOOD. WHAT ELSE?
A WEAPON.
LOUIS KAHN SAID, WANTS TO BE SOMETHING." "EVEN A BRICK
